data.title: Disney's The Artistocats Kids - Choose Marshall

data.text:
Theater

Auditions for Disney’s 101 Dalmatians Kids | Disney’s The Artistocats Kids

The Franke Center’s Youth Theater is pleased to announce

auditions and an Audition Workshop for Kindergarten – 5th grade students

The Franke Center’s Youth Theater is pleased it will produce a “double feature” production year, Disney’s 101 Dalmatians Kids along with Aristocats Kids. This year’s young thespians will have

an exciting opportunity to participate even more!

The first show, based on the classic animated film, Disney’s 101 Dalmatians Kids is a fur-raising adventure featuring Cruella De Vil, Disney’s most outrageous villain, and 101 of the most

adorable heroes to set their paws onstage. With a high-spirited score and lovable characters, this stage adaptation is certain to charm and delight all audiences.

The 2nd show, based on the beloved animated film, and featuring a jazzy, upbeat score, Disney’s The Aristocats Kids is a non-stop thrill ride of feline fun, complete with unbelievable twists and

turns. In the heart of Paris, a kind and eccentric millionairess wills her entire estate to Duchess, her high-society cat, and her three little kittens. Laughs and adventure ensue with a bumbling

butler, the rough-and-tumble alley cat, Thomas O’Malley, and his band of swingin’ jazz cats. “We are thrilled to introduce this new concept that will allow us to give many more youth the opportunity to shine. These shows give off the nostalgic feel of Saturday morning cartoons and I am so excited to present these shows together,” says Allison Ebner, Director of Youth Theater.

The Audition Workshop is open to all, even if not auditioning for the show! It’s a great introduction to the theater. If auditioning, it’s a good opportunity to learn the audition materials and meet the team and other youth interested in theater. Participation in the workshop does not guarantee a role.

Saturday, August 3rd for K-2 nd grades from 10-12:30pm

Saturday, August 3rd for 3 rd -5 th grades from 1:30-4pm

Cost: $40.00

Auditions for the show will be:

Tuesday, August 6 th for 3 rd -5 th grades from 4:30 to 7pm

Wednesday, August 7 th for K-2 nd grades from 4:30 to 7pm

Thursday, August 9 th are possible call backs from 5pm – 8pm

There is a $10 registration fee (non-refundable) to audition. Advanced registration is available at https://thefranke.org/youth-theater/

Everyone is required to bring a current, non-returnable photo. If cast, there is a participation fee of $100. If multiple children in the same household are cast, $80 for each additional child. Need-based scholarships available. No one will be turned away for financial reasons.

Audition Schedule

*Auditions will take place at The Franke at 214 East Mansion Street, Marshall, MI 49068.

Registration is only available at https://thefranke.org/youth-theater/

Rehearsals begin Tuesday, August 20. Cast will be scheduled as needed based on their role. Show dates October 10th – 14th, 2024.

Production Team is Director, Deanna Flora; Choreographer, Bri Berning; Music Director, Hannah Stevens; Producer, Jennifer Popovits.

For more information contact Allison Ebner at [email protected].
